name: David Ramirez
text: Sort of! We didn't get far beyond the concept, some of the mechanics and locations, and the main guy....    You may want to get All You Need is Kill, which is a combat-focused,  simpler GHD. I liked it! I'll still watch the movie, but I wish they hadn't changed the title. Also, they should have stuck with an Asian for the main guy instead of Tom Cruise.
